original_text: That the land spue not you out also, when ye defile it, as it spued out the nations that were before you.
korean_text: 너희도 더럽히면 그 땅이 너희가 있기 전 주민을 토함 같이 너희를 토할까 하노라

sentences.original_text: That the land spue not you out also
as it spued out the nations
sentences.korean_translation: 그 땅이 여러 민족을 토해낸 것처럼
